description: This is a shoot em up game. In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them in the space. The player will destroy the core of the battleship of enemy to win the game. The DLC include map pack 086.

name: Mina the Hollower
description:
Mina the Hollower is a bone-chilling action-adventure game featuring classic gameplay and an 8-bit aesthetic in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.

Quick and deliberate 60fps action combat, captivating world design, and top-down adventuring combine in a nostalgic blend. Whip foes, burrow through the ground, and explore a pixel-perfect world in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

name: Squabble
description: A word game that pits you against your friends in a rapid-fire guessing match. Play against up to 99 other people and be the last standing.

name: Fusem
description:
The original 'Fusem' number stacking and jamming puzzle.

Start your game with a 6x6 grid of 2s, 4s, and 8s, and swap tiles to match your numbers.

Watch in excitement as your tile values compound in an exhilarating chain reaction which stacks your possible matches with every turn.

Delightfully simple to get started with, and fiendishly challenging as your numbers grow, this math merging, number fusing, score stacking and tile jamming puzzle game will have you strategizing several moves ahead as you plan not to corner your most valuable tiles or sabotage your next high score attempt.

Get involved in one of the most exciting number matching puzzles available and show off your high scores.

name: The Walking Stick
description: A stylish old man who loves adrenaline enters a world where canes release power. Collect powerful canes and travel through the four biomes full of challenges and action in an endless fight to conquer this fantastic world.

name: Neon Bricks
description: Neon Bricks is a arcade style game where you can't drop the ball. To reach your goal you need to destroy all the bricks.

name: Quarantineer
description: For the glory of Motherland, the truth shall never be revealed. None of us expected this, Yet history is repeating itself.

name: Catellite-609: Feline Space Adventure
description: Help the cats find alien friends! By exploring space using "Catellite-609" cats will be able to: build rooms, upgrade "Catellite-609" facilities, and develop a cat crew. Enjoy a unique space adventure!

name: Hostile Planet: Survival
description: Hostile Planet: Survival is a harsh adventure on an uncharted planet that full of danger and trials.

name: Thirty-One 3D Premium
description: Thirty-One 3D Premium brings a lot of game variants, challenging opponents and environments with great 3D graphics on your PC.You can play in Singleplayer offline or LAN and Online Mode! The full animated Tutorial explains rules of the popular card game step by step.

name: Arcante: Definitive Edition
description: A Fantasy Action RPG. Create your party and head off on an adventure. Playing Turn-Based or Real Time is up to you.

name: Clean Art
description: Touch the dots to collect pointskeep high 'point per second' in singleplayIn multiplay, get the most points within the time limitMove : WASD or Arrow key and Space barDraw : Mouse buttonWave ON OFF : F key

name: The Hungry One
description: A mysterious story about the consequences of loneliness and unfulfilled dreams. Help artificial intelligence in the form of a little girl and avoid facing a ruthless monster.

name: Mars Rover Simulator
description: The landing was successful! The rover under your control has landed on Mars. All you need is the energy, resources and experience gained as you explore. You have to explore the world, find resources, improve mechanisms and move on to explore the "Red Planet".

name: Nero's Adventure
description: Nero's adventure is a 2D puzzle adventure physic game, where pollution has taken over the ocean, down to the darkest depths. Every creature in the sea is struggling to survive, but there is still hope. Nero, a mutant anglerfish, is able to survive with toxicity, will he be able to clean up the sea?

name: Determina
description: Command great challengers in strategic online card battles, where there is absolutely no randomness: you control your fate.

name: Life of Pepe
description: Explore, craft, and fight in this minimalist survival game. Play alone or with a friend!

name: Spiceshifter
description: Spiceshifter is a single-player game in 2.5D abstract graphics. The essence of the gameplay is to destroy hordes of enemies with the help of a wide variety of weapons, such as brass knuckles, magic or shotguns.

name: Top Gang
description: Top Gang is a very chaotic platform game for up to 4 cooperative players. You need to eliminate all enemies in the level to be able to advance at the same time you will have to rescue the "Nuggets" and take them safely to the exit. Your friends can be a big help or a stumbling block.

name: Soulless Legions
description: Breaking the limits of strategy games by hosting millions of ability combinations for each individual unit. Soulless Legions is a 1v1 multiplayer medieval fantasy 'Tug O' War' game that allows players a lifetime of customization and strategic inquiry.

name: Modern Game Tycoon
description: You are an aspiring game developer in 2000. Hire personal, expand offices, design the games of your dreams and try to make money from them. Reach as high as you can. From a small company to a huge corporation.

name: Telepath Tactics Liberated
description: An SRPG fan's SRPG! Imagine Fire Emblem with destructible battlefields; the ability to place traps; the ability to shove enemies off cliffs, into lava, or into each other; and a built-in campaign creator.

name: System Critical: The Race Against Time
description: Fun Run and Gun Platformer VR Shooter. Blast your arm cannon,use Grenades and melee weapons, Run, Jump, and Double Jump to dodge Projectiles and make your way through the carefully crafted levels. Discover secret areas and destroy objects while Navigating obstacles and defeat bosses to progress

name: Jeremia: Nightfall
description: Jeremiah: The Nightfall Our memories are what tell us who we are. But what if, suddenly, you had none? What if you had to emerge from the darkness on your own strength? Will you be ready to face your demons?

name: Salvationland
description: Deciding to find the "city of dreams", young traveller from the wasteland named Victor went to northern mountains by the old railway tracks. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving mankind turns into a struggle against an evil mayor and transformation into a hero-liberator...

name: Nitroverse
description: Nitroverse is a rogue-like hack & slay with level-based progression.

name: Drone VR
description: Do you love drones or are you thinking about buying one? Thanks to Drone VR, you will have the opportunity to fly drones in virtual reality - without the fear of smashing this expensive device. My task was to create an application for flying drones and release it at an affordable, low price.

name: ArrowBase
description: ArrowBase is a Versus platform game where the objective is to send your arrow on your opponent. You can slide, dive forward, attack your opponent in close combat to propel him into the air.

name: Grub Gauntlet
description: Grub Gauntlet is a playful physics-based puzzle game. Use bombs, portals, gravity wells, and more to make your way around walls, past spikes, through gates all to find your missing lunch!

name: The Grip of Madness
description: The Grip of Madness is a multiplayer cooperative FPS where your teammates can betray you at any time. Shoot your way through hordes of monsters, gather clues, and complete the ritual to stop their invasion.

name: Phobies
description: Phobies is a tactical card collecting strategy game where players battle one another in the surreal realm of the subconscious, where fears manifest. Use devious tactics and unleash a dazzling array of attacks and abilities to achieve victory!

name: Srok Godnosti
description: Srok Godnosti is an atmospheric adventure game set in the post-USSR setting. In the role of a district police officer, you will have to serve in a small town lost in time. The fate and lives of city residents will depend on your actions.

name: OplitisAV
description: You are a Ferocious Anti-virus Systemic Trucidator (FAST), you are injected in an infected system, and your sole objective is to eradicate all virus life forms.

name: Animal Simulator
description: New unique open world survival game. Choose one of the animals and survive in the open world together with your group, or human friend. Each animal has its own style of play. You can choose a predator or a little rabbit. It’s up to you.

name: Hyperjustice
description: HyperJustice is a fast-paced third-person shooter inspired by 1980’s cop movies and television. Sprint through neon-stained Miami as you battle the mob and try to prevent the distribution of a world-ending drug.

name: True Bum Simulator
description: The game about the life story of a bum who is trying to realize an old dream and become the richest bum in this world. This is a True Bum Simulator where you can become anyone from a beggar who fights for life to an influential celebrity who has the whole world in her hands.

name: The Cloud Dream of the Nine
description:
Yang Soyu, lives in a village in Hwaju Castle, in the state of Cheonin. Her father, a fairy god from Mt. Gonryun ascended to the fairy world after his connection with the human world came to an end when his beloved wife passed away, Soyu’s mother.

With no parents to raise her, Soyu was taken in by her friend Chaeyoon and his family. While the villagers in her town, are resentful to Soyu, thinking her story about her father being a fairy god is absurd, it was only her friend Chaeyoon and his family, that she fully trusts.

One unfortunate day, their house burned down and amidst the calamity, Chaeyoon goes missing. Soyu sets off on a journey to find her friend, and along the way meets new characters (which either became her friend or her potential love interest).

During her journey, Soyu will get to unravel the secrets behind the political tyranny of their land. Her fate and ending will change depending on the choices you, as a player, choose for her.

name: VirtualCop
description: Step into the shoes of a New Zealand Police officer. Search for forensic evidence, connect with the community, and catch offenders in this immersive 3D experience. Do you care enough to be a cop?

name: Four Animals
description: Four Animals is an arcade scoring game.

name: Proto Shooter Lychee
description: This is an action shooting game where the girl defeats the monsters that come at her.

name: Parametric Creature: Lab
description: Explore and create parametric creatures

name: I Have No Weapons
description: I Have No Weapons is a rogue-lite action indie game. It offers 36 interesting ways to kill enemies, by using enemy body parts as weapons...

name: Virago
description: The game is about a young girl called willow, after an incident with her stalker she begins to suffer from hallucinations.

name: Forgotten Souls
description: Turn-based strategy game based on the classic Lost Souls.

name: Kuroi Tsubasa
description: Meet Kureha Kurono and her friends in this charming visual novel! With the help of the devil Blackwing-chan they'll be able to defeat the evil shadow, right? What was that? It was Blackwing himself who caused this mess? Oh dear, oh dear.

name: Mad Cart
description: Enjoy the ride in a fast-paced game! It is endless runner with puzzle elements! Rotate circle platforms, think, shoot and don't forget to enjoy stylized and colorful graphics!

name: ChaoticNightmare
description: "FerryGate" focuses on the experience of walking in horror scenes. Players will carry cameras to explore special places in areas blocked by the government, record videos, and avoid the supernatural creatures' kill

name: Goodbye World
description: Goodbye World is a narrative adventure game. Play through 12 stages of a puzzle platformer while following the two protagonists through 13 chapters of their story.

name: Fruit Basket
description: Fruit Basket is an arcade game that makes your brain work to the maximum. Jump over the fruits, getting further and further to the basket. Pepper flying on its axis can send you to the beginning. Cactus is also dangerous. The game is not for the "weak".

name: Devil's Eyes
description: Mike arrives at university and is ready to have a time of his life, but something is not quite right. Follow the story and unveil the mysteries behind the tragic events.

name: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea
description: At the turn of the century, Victorian life carries on with one sharp difference from our world — vampires run amok and are a part of every day life. After having run away from home to search for his best friend, the young Cecil meets Nemo, a pickpocketing vagabond. The two set out together but in order to find what they're searching for, they must first unravel the truth behind a series of brutal vampire attacks from a decade prior.

name: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition
description: Sir, You Are Being Hunted: Reinvented Edition presents a savagely funny world of procedurally-generated stealth and survival. Roam wild in spooky British landscapes, all the while being hunted by a menagerie of bloodthirsty robots. A beautifully remastered new edition of the cult survival game.

name: Blocktopia
description: Blocktopia is a sandbox RPG where you can freely customize characters, buildings, and decorations.

name: Bard Idle
description: Build a unique team, where each character has a random weapon, race and class. Strong combinations of heroes, enhanced by the ballad creation system and jelly dwarfs, will capture your adventure in history!

name: Present Cannon Rebirth
description: Action/Arcade/Rail-Shooter. It's Christmas Eve and it's up to you to save Christmas, by delivering all the Christmas presents while saving people from an alien invasion, using only your magic Present Cannons.

name: SlapBR
description: SlapBR is a simplistic, horror battle royale. You can compete with friends, create and join rooms, and become terrified as you hide-slap-block your way to victory.

name: The Unearthened
description: Build & defend a small remote mining base on Taichin XI from the alien hordes. Deploy defenses, upgrade your turrets and get ready for the nightfall. The Unearthened is a classic Tower Defense game where you build towers and prepare for the invasion.

name: Tied by your Red
description: A story of the sold girl Erica is about to live with the Duke who has a very bad reputation in this terrifying mansion. She has to live where she will die if she says something wrong in accident? ! A Lily story, stereotype but sweet story of Beauty and the Beast will be staged soon.

name: Wave Jumper
description: Wave Jumper is a 80's Synthwave platformer aimed at keeping momentum high and decisions quick.

name: Marlon’s Mystery: The Darkside of Crime
description: Marlon’s Mystery: The Darkside of Crime will test your skills as an investigator. Join Abby Marlon to solve the riddles in this captivating mystery and hidden object game. Embark on an enigmatic adventure and discover the darkest secrets of the Taylor family.

name: They Look Like People
description: A Psychological story game set within a Kubrickian world. A tale of Space & Adventure into the Abyss of your mind, two astronauts come into close encounters with an unknown object during a routine mission.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Survivors of the Void
description: Embrace The Void as it overtakes Petrichor V in the multiplayer roguelike Risk of Rain 2's first-ever expansion, Survivors of the Void! New survivors, monsters, stages, and a new class of items have arrived to help you kick the crabs back to their dimension.

name: Club Soccer Director 2022
description: Take control of a Real Football Club or create your own club, in Club Soccer Director 2022 a fast-paced Football Club Management Game. Download Club Soccer Director 2022 now for FREE & start your Football management journey.

name: Godshard Chronicles
description: Godshard Chronicles is a top-down action RPG based in the world of the Godshard novels with music by famed composer Noriyuki Iwadare. Inspired by titles such as The Legend of Zelda, Grandia, and the Mana series. Fight in action-packed battles, explore a sprawling world either solo or with a friend!

name: Vacant Kingdom
description: Vacant Kingdom is a synthesis of bullet hell and story-driven action-RPG. Explore a whimsical yet desolate land and rally its adrift people by solving their problems.

name: Bomb Club: Deluxe
description: If you have a knack for explosives, the Bomb Club welcomes you! Meet new bombs, uncover new challenges, and create awesome chain reactions in this explosive puzzle game!

name: Funtasia
description: Funtasia is a paradise polluted by airborne garbage turning it into a landfill. Only a handful of heroes and their goofy machines can help. Push the pedal to the metal, drive as fast as you can, and survive the Furry Road in this unique, sidescrolling racing game for single and co-op players!

name: Expresso Espresso
description: Expresso Espresso is a coffee shop management game with a great focus on in-depth coffee creation and market simulation. Roast different coffee beans from across the world, create different drinks from a variety of syrups and styles, manage your team of baristas to create the best coffee drink!

name: Casino Tycoon Simulator
description: Upgrade your casino and become millionaire! Manage your Slots, BlackJacks, Roullettes, and many more. Protect your casino against thieves and cheaters.Want more? jump into mining market or build your dream nightclub!

name: No One's Earth
description: Explore the abandoned CCTA through various simulations of alien environments, and improve your equipments to beat natural and synthetic challenges, looking for the ingredients that can resolve the Earth dispute, in this 2.5D science fiction adventure.

name: Reflex
description: A casual puzzle game in which you add components to unknown enemy bases that will reflect, duplicate and split the Reflex missiles. Destroy the enemy power generators, communication systems and weapon platforms across more than 100 levels. Each new world brings with it new technology to utilise.

name: Virulence
description: Virulence is a 2D top down metroidvania / Zelda-like action RPG, where the player will explore the human body as a virus species and infect other cells in order to survive. The player can control an individual virus or command a whole population.

name: Ritual Night
description: Summon Cthulhu in this social deduction game with no early eliminations! Monsters work together to complete the ritual, while stealthy humans secretly sabotage and cause chaos.

name: Deformity
description: Deformity is a turn-based fantasy strategy about a world dominated by sins.

name: Paintball
description: Are you ready for bright colors?

name: The Last Clockwinder
description: Create intricate clockwork contraptions out of your own clones and restore life to an ancient tree. Your mission is to repair the Clocktower, an ancient haven for the galaxy’s plants and seeds.

name: Bizarre Mutation World
description: A science fiction turn-based logic game. Klorofit needs to solve the puzzles to save his pet from genetic mutation.

name: Touhou Adventure
description: Girls are now praying ! Will you pray too ?

name: Timmy the Tiger's Big Adventure
description: This is a small game designed to be a cute, fun, and casual experience for gamers of all ages. It was made in RPGMaker XP so the controls are simple and easy to use. Take control of a tiger and guide him to his new home, after a mysterious disaster threatens to destroy everything he knows.

name: Scufflers
description: Knock opponents as far off-screen as possible. A platform-fighter with extremely simply controls. Game is played in rounds, where everything resets when someone is knocked off the screen, until someone is the last character standing.

name: GrubDash Driver: Food Delivery Driver Simulator
description: It’s the year 2020. A mysterious, unknown event has decimated the economy and the only source of income that remains is delivering food. Open the GrubDash game and start delivering now!

name: MeecheenMe
description: A crazy online third person shooter. Create and import Custom Models & Custom Taunts for everyone to see!

name: Sokobos
description: Sokoban meets Greek Tragedy. Solve challenging puzzles that expand on the timeless Sokoban formula with new and unique twists that will knot your brain.

name: Totally Normal Boyfriend

description: One night, an alarm goes off in the old mansion of one of the richest families in the world. You, an employee of a security agency, go to find out the reason for this, but you quickly realize that everything is not as simple as it seemed at first.

name: Edwardo
description: Edwardo is a stealth first-person horror game where you must search and collect samples using a UV-light. Beware! Edwardo is not happy that you have infiltrated his hideout and is armed with a Tommy gun.

name: Cursed Dungeon
description: Cursed Dungeon is an excellent 2D rpg with hardcore elements, in which you need to resist the ancient evil and try to get out of the cursed dungeons.

name: Angry Rocketeer Frenzy
description: Angry rockeeteer frenzy - Are cursed robots trying to take over Earth? Not on my shift! Take your trusty rocket launcher into service and destroy all the enemies of our planet in this unusual mix of shoot 'em up and roguelite genres!

name: That Castle
description: A huge castle arose in the north devastating everything around it, the kingdoms are afraid, making agreements and political movements. A reward was made to the brave, can you find the culprit and put an end to it?

name: King Boo
description: Play as King Boo, who unfortunately has lost their royal adornments and must find them back before being allowed back in the castle! A simple, colorful adventure game for young players.

name: THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challenge
description: THICC: The Himalayan Ice Climbing Challenge is a 2-4 player online party game. Climb, Swing, Grab your way to claim victory over your friends in the THICC cup.

name: Lost in the Storm
description: Lost in the Storm is a single-player first-person mystery game with a little bit of puzzle-solving and action in between. The game is set in Andrew's deep subconscious using "The Light", a lantern God has given him to defend himself against the darkness and guide him to wake up from his coma.

name: Warlordocracy
description: A party-based RTWP (real-time with pause) RPG that gradually grows into a large-scale strategy game as you amass soldiers and fame (or infamy).

name: Find Exit
description: This is not what you are looking for. Who knows, he remembers.

name: Deviation from Way
description: You are a program, an Android of the RA model, which is being tested in an unknown laboratory. You will be presented with a test to check the functionality of this model. Your fate and the fate of others depends on how you pass this test.

name: Gem Worlds
description: Gem World is a roguelike-puzzle hybrid. Explore 100 levels in 10 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 20 diverse skills across multiple runs. Exploit obstacles like mines, teleporters, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.

name: Bumballon
description: Join the cute Bumballon on this frantic journey into a colorful world full of dangers! Fast, fun and with an ability to control your super speed. Collect all the magic emeralds to complete each level and discover new mechanics throughout the adventure.

name: Cupcake Remember
description: Cupcake Remember is a fun, challenging and cute game. Where you need to help a baker deliver your cupcakes. In a mix of memory game and puzzle, you will have to push the limits of your memory.

name: Gazmatera II: America's Least Wanted
description: Find out the long story, about how the famous "generals" met and appeared in the new third-person shooter from Victor "LVL90DRU1D" Gazmanoff and his Kalifas! Take control of four survivors, Jeff, Kayla, Helga and Emina! Rush through 15 breathtaking levels and find out how the fate of heroes formed!

name: Escape Room: The Sorcerer's Curse
description: Play our escape room game from your own home. A curse has befallen the town of Inglesfear. You, a lowly villager have been chosen to enter the sorcerer's house, break the curse, and escape unscathed. Can you outsmart the sorcerer and win freedom for your village?

name: Battle Snakes
description: Battle Snakes is a 2-4 player local multiplayer arcade game where you compete with your friends in different arenas to be the last snake standing.

name: Bit Sword
description: A 1-bit retro platformer ready for action

name: Dead Transmission
description: Play an experimental asymmetric co-op multiplayer with your friend! Have one person move through a FPS horror level while the other be the eye in the sky. Can you and your friend communicate well enough to make it through all the difficulty levels?

name: A Twisted Tale
description:
Discover a humouristic point and click adventure inspired by all the masterpieces which made us stick to our computers back in the day (and therefore we played outside way too infrequently). Full of loony characters, unexpected twists and challenging riddles.
Accompany Vio on her unintentional journey through various realms. Explore broken cities, pirate ships in the deepest jungle and other unreal places. Stand by her side when she makes the acquaintance of the (depressive) Death and engage with lots of explicit and ambiguous references, hommages and imitations of the big classics past (and not quite past) times.

name: Spear Girl
description: Spear Girl is a puzzle-adventure platformer where you use your special spear to explore a kingdom where adherents have subjugated the king and imprisoned him, taking the crown. Climb mountains, pass through cursed forests and dark caves to unravel the mysteries behind the power of the spear.

name: Sotano
description: Sotano is a first person 3d escape room puzzle adventure. Explore areas, collect items and take in your surroundings. You will need all of your puzzle solving skills to put together a plan to make your way through the house, solving riddles and through the many rooms to escape the house of Sotano.

name: Bigger Bikes
description: Bigger Bikes is a simulator of riding bikes, in off-road conditions. The game is based on realistic control of motorcycles and bicycles and fun physics!

name: Help Me
description: A horrific choose your own adventure where you need to get out of the house!

name: Tails From Alteria
description: Tails From Alteria is a wacky RPG that follows the misadventures of twin foxes Jeeve and Jayla Javari, as they race against unseen forces and try to stop the world from ending.

name: Mr.Treemp
description: Collect gold coins, climb higher and higher, seek the love of voters; everything is like in life! A small polititian began his journey to great wealth and success. But will he stuff his pockets with gold and achieve his aim? It depends only on your agility and persistence...

name: Alchemos
description:
In Alchemos, you'll pilot a Proto-Atomic Shell - an atomic-sized device capable of collecting and combining subatomic particles - to discover the elements. Explore weird and wonderful experimental worlds, and challenge your friends to beat your best times

But beware, the particles you seek may be guarded by the forces of Dark Matter! As the Dark Atoms evolve to defeat you, you'll need to upgrade your Proto-Atomic Shell: dash and jump to safety, traverse quantum tunnels, emit particles to freeze your foes, or even annihilate them completely

name: Heroic Pirates
description: Heroic Pirates puts you in the shoes of a pirate commander and you need to use your pirate team cleverly in order to survive everything that comes your way. The game map features multiple levels that you need to complete until you uncover the treasure. This is not a walk in the park, but it’s one of the most exhilarating and enticing game experiences that you will ever have. Test it out for yourself and you will have fun playing with the pirates as you reach the end and uncover the reassure. You can also recruit pirates along the way and enlarge your team! Features: Exhilarating pirate gameplay Recruit more pirates to join your team Follow a beautiful pirate map

name: Tumbledown Drive
description:
Drive, jump and honk your way to the top of this exceedingly punishing platformer.
Be careful, it's a long, long way down if you fall.
Includes controller support, a speedrun timer, regular secrets and secrets.

name: Mini 4WD Hyper Dash Grand Prix
description: Mini 4WD Hyper Dash Grand Prix is a mobile racing and customizing game developed by BANDAI. In the game, you are able to create your very own mini racer freely. You will be provided tons of machine parts to fine-tune your car, and then you can use it to race against other players. Besides, the sound effect of the game are all generated by real-life mini racer's machine sounds, and the manga characters of the original series will also make an appearance in the game.

name: 1/2 Red Riding Hood
description: There is this girl known as the Red Riding Hood. She has the strength of ten men. This is a completely different story about the familiar fairy-tale character Red Riding Hood. A much darker and twisted version

name: Rude Breaker
description: Rude Breaker is a shoot 'em up game and a spin-off of the Aleste series.

name: 13's
description: A fun number matching puzzler that'll keep you hooked for days!

name: Karagon
description: Survive and shoot killer robots then reuse their parts to construct your own rideable robots! Build a base, gather resources, craft weapons! Shoot, construct, and ride the most massive robots in this post apocalyptic open world survival crafting game! Experience cutting edge UE5 Lumen technology!

name: Community College Hero: Fun and Games
description: Ever wonder how heroes-in-training spend their time between epic confrontations with dastardly villains? Join the students at Speck Community College as they enjoy a tabletop roleplay game, investigate a legendary small-town monster, and endure the embarrassments of Parents’ Day.

name: Fill me up
description:
A puzzle game for puzzle lovers.

Fill the grid with oddly shaped puzzle pieces.

simple.clean.fun

name: Devil's Dungeon
description: Heroes and girls come to the Devil Lord's Dungeon. Can they defeat the Devil Lord or be captured and become slaves? Devil's Dungeon is a real-time strategy game. The game centers on creating mazes and monsters to help defend the Devil Lord from heroes seeking to destroy him.

name: Arboreal
description: Play as a lizard climbing to the top of the tallest tree in the forest!

name: Cyberpunk Girls
description: Cyberpunk Girl is a brutal action shooter set in the year 2169 in the cyber metropolis Oplot. The city of the future, which has become a save heaven for thugs, hackers, and gold diggers. Win the most breathtaking battles. And remember that everything comes with a price.

name: Battle Barn: Tactics
description: Recruit animals with abilities to fight bite-sized tactical battles...And why not take down an interdimensional space clown while you're at it?

name: Trapped in the Forest
description: You awake in a mysterious forest that seems strangely familiar. Have you been here before? Is this a dream or a nightmare?

name: Bikini Armour Explorers
description: Pienetta, a weapon store's daughter in a remote country, is fascinated by adventure because of an old map. Fate seemed to see through her mind. Under the influence of some emergencies, Pienetta embarked on an adventure with her three companions.

name: Wizard Girl Anzu
description: An exciting story about a wizard girl who fights evil...? Scratch that, it's actually a story about one of the mob characters from this Anime series. One day, this mob character develops personality and suddenly realizes everyone around him is an "NPC", characters without any kind of willpower.

name: Mystic Cards
description: This Game is a card oracle simulator.It's a game that could change the way you consult an oracle.

name: Lucky Tlhalerwa: Super Incursion
description: Super Incursion is a 7-8 Hours Long Linear Third-Person Story Adventure. Buy & upgrade multiple guns & melee weapons, spend skillpoints on 3 skill trees enabling new powerful abilities, upgrade your 5 main attributes to gain access to new gameplay features which change your gameplay experience.

name: Asteroid Arena
description: A player vs player, last man standing, space ship arena battle.

name: The Final Hour
description: The Final Hour is a captivating first person horror game with its very own story. Can you solve the mystery of the mysterious house? Has your final hour come? Find out now in "The Final Hour."

name: Basault VR
description: Basault VR is a virtual reality movement shooter. Run, jump, swing around on your grappling hook and shoot with a variety of complex yet familiar firearms. Use those tools to survive and reach the end of this roguelite!

name: Plum Bun Reformatted
description: Reformatted to 200 custom handmade pages, this Harlem Renaissance story confronts the reader with questions about personas people wear with challenging themes of race, gender, and capitalism. When two sisters Angela and Virginia are prompted by society, this difficult story explores their choices.

name: Robert: Space Stories and Battles
description: Space shootouts and fascinating stories.

name: Idle Research
description: Idle Research is an addictive, resource management, incremental game with both idle and active playstyles. Research and craft colorful Flasks, Tubes, and Cylinders to earn as much Energy as possible! Big numbers guaranteed.

name: Bluewater: Private Military Operations VR
description: Welcome to experience this "BlueWater VR", which is a military theme VR game. Its ultra-high graphic quality brought with 38GB data would be shocking.

name: Yonder World: Interview with the Void
description: A psychological horror story, with a spiking sense of danger and gentle melancholy. An out of this world adventure, revolving around books, memories and mortality. Along the way, perhaps you shall pick up pieces of a long forgotten heart, or some unlikely companions that you never knew you needed.

name: Light Paradox
description: Light Paradox is an J-RPG/Survival 2D pixelart game. The story behind the creation of the universe, the information control and the individual character storyline mix all together into this complex world.

name: Stakeholder Game
description: Investment business simulation game. Become the richest billionaire ever! Build your financial empire out of merged companies and increase your capital.

name: Warehouse Simulator: Forklift Driver
description: Manage specialized equipment used in warehouses and become a professional in your field. And the well-developed mechanics of the movement of specialized warehouse equipment allows you to experience the sensations of working in a warehouse without leaving your computer.

name: Ink and Paper: Wandering
description: Fight enemies with four different styles in turn-based tactical combat. Grant mercy to your enemies and maybe they'll spare you. Flee when you can't win, and return with friends. Avoid spiritual foes, who can't be defeated in battle. Step in the world of the well known, but still different fantasy.

name: Heart of a Warrior
description: Heart of a warrior is a RPG game in an open world where you play as Nahele, a young warrior of ancient bloodline on his journey to rescue his twin sister from the underworld, as he travel through portals to different realms of existence.

name: It Takes Two Girls
description: Who would refuse the request of two beautiful girls to travel together~

name: Run Ninja Run
description: Become a Ninja and run, throw shurikens, jump, slide and kill to get trought the end of the game.

name: Pleasure Kingdom
description: Pleasure Kingdom gameplay is a mix of traditional CCG mechanics with thrilling visual novel.

name: Skew Pong
description: Skew Pong is a unique fast-paced take on a classic. Make use of inertia and gravity to win. Push the area around and bend the floor to influence the ball's trajectory. Battle against your friends or AI's and see if you can skew with it.

name: Awakened Evil
description: Awakened Evil is an action platformer inspired by the classics. Jump and slash your way through intense linear stages that will put your skills to the test. Do you have what it takes to slay all the bosses, and take on evil itself?

name: Please Subscribe
description: Please Subscribe is the sequel to Gamer Career Tycoon from 2018. Develop your own livestream channel from the ground up. Manage and operate, overcome challenges, learn new tricks in order to rise in the charts, and possibly, become the next big internet superstar.

name: Claustrophobia
description: Claustrophobia offers a scary and dark horror experience filled with blood boiling moments, The game can have different endings, depending on how you play and what decisions you make. Can you figure out what the government is hiding in this grueling facility?

name: Crowd Sign: Emission
description: Crowd Sign: Emission is a game where you paint a signs and watch the action unfold then later you can explore the world of the game in first person mode. Fantastic quest story with a branched out plot. The scenario is randomly generated each time, and the lore is created by the player himself.

name: Lucky Fish Bread
description: Let the world know the fish bread! Wake up the fish bread fairies to learn a variety of menus, satisfy the customers, and protect the store from the villains!

name: Skeeter's Grid
description: Re-connect mixed-up circuits in this 80s-inspired isometric puzzler as you move from board to board, each of increasing complexity and variation. Collect components, remnants of former grid guardians, as you rebuild each system, with the chance of additional components spawning during replays.

name: Abandoned Archive
description: Abandoned Archive is a fantasy, spell-casting, rogue-like, featuring a wide variety of relics, a unique spell-upgrading system, with compelling and engaging bosses. Each floor is filled with items and mysteries for the player to uncover; what will you discover in the Abandoned Archive?

name: Deadly Nightmare
description: Deadly Nightmare is an exciting and engaging Horror/Survival game where you play the role of a boy living in a big manor. You need to use all the tools at your disposal in order to explore the world, find mysteries and explore a variety of challenging, scary and supernatural locations.

name: Zeppelin: Escape Room
description: Escape the impending death by restarting Zeppelin systems and fleeing the dying planet. Cooperative Escape Room game to challenge yourself and your friends. Get out of confinement, solve amazing and challenging mysteries before the timer runs out!

name: Oogy: Can You Help
description: Play as a business card-wielding sheep in this mysterious indie narrative deckbuilder. Explore a character-rich map, collect new mechanics, uncover dark mysteries, and make new friends. Oh—plus secrets, bosses, and all original music with a hand-drawn art style!

name: ConflictCraft 2
description: Conflict Craft 2 it's a strategy game where you'll need proper management of your resources, but also leadership skills in order to fully control the opposing forces.

name: Asterism: Apex of War
description: First and third person single player sci fi action shooter. Destroy the Neurobonded menace and prevent humanities extinction.

name: Greedy Rabbit
description: Fun arcade and logic game, where you are greedy rabbit. In each level you have to collect all the vegetables and possibly stars. Then look for the open portal to the next level. Do this with the best result.

name: Lords of Solgrund
description: Lords of Solgrund combines elements of city building and slow-paced tactical battles. The game features detailed animations and systems inspired by the early middle ages, combined with magical, spiritual and other fantastical elements.

name: Sugar Story
description: The day has come ... You've been given a very important mission to get sugar for your family because it's just over. Can you cope with this challenge? I tell you right away, it won't be easy ... You think it's just a quest for sugar and on the way the world turns upside down

name: Cold House
description: Cold House is a co-op horror game for 1-4 people. You and your friends get into a car accident and are forced to hide from the cold in an abandoned house where it will soon turn out that they are not alone at all..

name: Nello in Antwerp
description: Nello in Antwerp is a free-to-play experience set in the world of A Dog of Flanders (in development). You will play as a young boy in 19th century Belgium, penniless but with an artistic dream of painting. You will use pencil and brush to record the landscape you see.

name: Fragroom: Defenders
description: Fragroom: Defenders is a Tower Defense multiplayer shooting game set in a zombie post-apocalyptic town. Choose your weapons, fight against different enemies, find the best team and tactics to save your shelter from zombie foragers.

name: Gettysburg: Fields of Valor
description: An advanced historical war game that simulates the pivotal three-day battle at Gettysburg during the American Civil War. The game models every brigade, battery, and leader who participated in the largest battle ever fought on the North American continent.

name: Artisan
description: A young man finds himself trapped in an otherworldly museum where he is forced to fight in a battle royal using strange ghost-like creatures called Artisans.

name: Debug
description: Solving a puzzle made up of trauma of the commissioning robot, inferring the doctor's evaporated memory with the pieces he found, Take advantage of jumping, wall climbing, and running to challenge the adventure of breaking through obstacles.

name: Heka
description: Heka is a Mystery and Exploration based game set in the early roaring twenties. Venture to the Giza Necropolis to be the first eager Egyptologist to uncover an ancient tomb holding the secrets of the last native Pharoah!

name: MoonFall: Butterfly Lovers
description: 2021 Galgame popular works The story is based on Chinese legends Before the moon fell, Spending time with beautiful girl Kaori. Whether to live in a dreamlike utopia, Or face the harsh reality. Love, self, future, all in the world of Moonfall

name: The Dark Prophecy
description: The Dark Prophecy is a 2D pixel-art point & click adventure inspired by the best retro games of the 90's. Welcome to a peaceful medieval village, where life is safe and calm. But one fateful night, everything changes.

name: Lord of the Rings: Warrior of Middle Earth
description: Turn your TV into the epic battlefield in Middle-Earth! Wield the wireless sword to shield yourself and defeat your enemies. The sword actually interacts with your TV screen! Just plug the castle turret into your TV or VCR, and you're ready to fight Orc Archers, the Cave Troll, Gollum, Saruman, and more. You'll team up with your favorite characters such as Aragorn, Gandalf, Frodo, Legolas, and others. This interactive plug and play game brings the fantastic land of Middle-Earth, and the epic battles and adventures from The Lord of the Rings, right into your living room! Lord of the Rings: Warrior of Middle Earth comes with a castle turret, wireless sword, and complete gameplay instructions.

name: Mysterious Adventure of Michael 2
description: Action game of dreams and hopes.

name: Helium Electric
description: The year is 1986 and you just got a job at the Helium Electric corporation.Your adventure begins on the Moon, where you manage a helium harvesting station.You are alone and your family is counting on you.

name: Mega City Void
description: You play the role of a black hole that has penetrated our world. Your task is to absorb as many houses, trees, cars and other objects as possible.

name: Talespinner
description: Talespinner is a deck-building roguelite game that takes place in an exotic and bizarre world of Japanese mythology. Players take the role of a mysterious storyteller visited by various mythological gods and demons who only have one wish - to experience an incredible story.

name: Ritual Tournament
description: Ritual Tournament is a 2d Fighting Game with retro style gameplay and story. Choose between 8 fighters, to take part in a deadly tournament, with a story inspired by the 80s movies and also the classic Fighting Games from that age, mixed with a mystical, dark, mythology.

name: Safari Cannon
description: A wholesome game, where you shoot across the African Safari and discover all the wild beasts of the savannah.

name: Goblin Town
description: The Goblins have been enslaved too long under the Ratfolk. Now comes the time to strike back and DESTROY them once and for all, but don't get too cocky, there's no telling what they might have in store for you. Use your Goblin Skills and Charm in this Action-Adventure, Roguelite.

name: Witchbane
description: Witchbane is a retro-styled 2D action platformer where you must use your skills and weapons to defeat the evil brought unto the world by witches. Work your way through each distinct level and defeat the witch who controls the horde of monsters in that area to end the blight placed upon the land.

name: Remoteness
description: New York, 2034: back home from a crazy party at the pub, you wake up late and immediately understand that something is wrong. The district you live in has been evacuated and isolated overnight by the army, after an electrical meteor shower hit the Earth!

name: Whispers in the West
description: Untangle thrilling mysteries by exploring the merciless and lawless Wild Western town of Brimstone. You and your friends need to collaborate, interrogate the town's residents and piece the clues together to solve the mystery!

name: Sharp Wands
description: Fight your friends in an action packed 2D experience, learn to use the forest at your advantage and collect useful powerups to show off your style! Learn to fight with different characters each with its unique powers and flaws

name: Race for Your Life
description: Race for your life - In this racing game you try to pass on the license from a radical car inspector. Any mistake you make can be the last in your life .. Literally!

name: The Last Rite of Death
description: You will have to get used to the role of the main character James, with whom you will learn the terrible story of his Walker family, solve riddles, get to the truth and find out what really happened in this cursed house.

name: You Better Run
description: You Better Run is a fun party online multiplayer indie game for (2-4) players.

name: Sorcerer's Tournament
description: This turn-based RPG is about growing and improving new characters with mini-games between each battle as you permanently unlock new spells, modes and difficulties. Pick the way your student fights, and develop them to reach the number one spot!

name: SpaceBourne 2
description: Your legacy is calling. Prepare yourself for fast-paced space combats. Take your ship, gird on your best gears and raise your new galactic empire.

name: No Tyrant
description: A FPS shooting hero counter dictator game.

name: Crown Delights Deli
description: Crown Delights Deli is a visual novel with multiple dialect/language choices. As the cashier at a Brooklyn bodega, choose to talk in English, AAVE, or Spanish to a diverse cast of characters as you try to maintain a five-star rating for your boss.

name: Rated Mutant
description: Slash and Blast through a subterranean laboratory to rescue your father from the evil 'V'. Explore treacherous paths, gruesome monsters and uncover secrets all while mastering unique weapons, in this action packed, death defying Metroidvania.

name: Rise of the White Sun
description: Rise of the White Sun is one of the deepest political simulator set in the Chinese Warlord era. Play as every significant faction of 1920’s China : the Guomindang, the Chinese Communist Party, the Warlords and even the masters of the underworld - the Green Gang.

name: Project Absentia
description: Fight your way through this cartoony FPS with insane characters, intense level design, and verticality like never before! This fully-voice acted FPS will push you to new levels.

name: Tales of Morrow
description: Create your tale! Build, fight, farm, and explore in this relaxing yet adventurous experience. You decide your fate!

name: Wilderplace
description: Wilderplace is a puzzle-adventure game set within the Divine Garden, an idyllic creation of the gods that has plunged into chaos and conflict. You play as a shaman, tasked with restoring order through your magical abilities. Explore the maze-like environment, harness magical artifacts, and uncover mysteries as you wrangle restless spirits and evade dangerous intruders.

name: Tanasurga
description: Tanasurga is an Narrative driven RPG where you play as mecha mercenaries in alternate WW2 setting. Build your own mecha, recruit and lead a team of pilots with different characteristics and skills. Gain riches and determine how the war unfolds between 3 main factions.

name: Escape Logan Estate
description: A visit to the Logan Estate leaves a family in pieces. Play as three different family members to explore and solve puzzles to reveal the mystery surrounding the estate.

name: Night Stalkers
description: Be the monster in Night Stalkers. A third person indie game where you choose one of 4 monsters to terrorize a village by hunting the locals. Over the course of your destruction you draw the attention of guards, heroes, and monster hunters to challenge you.

name: The Legend of the War Axe
description: The Legend of the War Ax is a real-time, third-person PvP combat. Choose a hero and fight other players in various arenas. Dynamic sword fighting, archery, magic and bombs. Now there are 8 heroes for which you can play.

name: Driftence
description: In Driftence, you have to drive a racing car on several tracks. Main goal: To gain points by drifting your car.

name: A Distant Stabbing
description: A game designed to upset you. Master bouncing your arrows to see how high you can climb. Ideal for alt-tab gaming while you wait for your next match to start!

name: Cryptonaut
description: Cryptonaut: A retro-inspired crypto-themed first-person shoot 'em up! Blast and evade. Collect and score. The easiest way to make millions in crypto!

name: Santa Protects the Christmas Tree
description: Snowmen are stealing the Christmas presents! Santa Claus must protect the gifts! Tell him where to move while he shoot snowballs against the Snowmen! Pickup blinking Presents to acquire new Snowball-Launchers or activate an effect.

name: Galactic Frontier
description: Galactic Frontier is a story focused Sci-Fi explorative twin stick shooter. Embark on an intergalactic adventure in the chaotic and war torn expanse of what was the Milky Way. Fight alongside rebels or repress them! Become a pirate or submit to the Machine Plague, choose your own destiny.

name: The Soul Box
description: The Soul Box is a kinetic visual novel about the mystery of a puzzle box. A story of an inheritance hidden behind what’s written. A different look at the future, a worried glance at the past.

name: Deadwater Saloon
description: Dive into the wild west as a saloon owner in a volatile frontier town. Customize your character and face the consequences of your choices as you forge friendships and enemies of townsfolk, travellers, outlaws and lawmen. Build the most famous saloon in the territory, or be overrun and destroyed.

name: Donut Arena
description: Where hunger prevails, a tournament is organized. There is only one rule: eat them all. Donut Arena is an action game that can't be tamed without smart planning. Try your best to please the kings, hype the crowd, conquer underwears and the gods shall answer the call.

name: Hereford 1642
description: Hereford 1642 is a historically based recreation of my home city of Hereford in England UK from the year 1642. I have pieced together a picture of the city as it once was. Take a step into 17th century life and experience history in full 3D with realistic graphics.

name: Richard West and the Golden Mask
description: Help Richard West to find the Golden Mask in this adventure game, fulfilled with dangerous traps, mysteries and puzzles to solve. Use your skills to overcome obstacles and reach your goal.

name: The Future Project
description: Take control of an AI soldier, explore planets, and partake in fast paced combat in The Future Project, a first person metroidvania. Explore distinct worlds, obtain new weapons and abilities, and defeat powerful enemies in humanity's quest to journey the stars.

name: Alchemical Inc.
description: Card battle your rivals turn by turn. Explore the mean steampunk streets of New Folk City. Trade your cards to craft the perfect deck or else you're going home empty handed.

name: Viy: Retold Story
description: the game in the quest genre is based on the Gogol's story 'Vij'.

name: In the Wild
description: Take control of your favorite animal and learn interesting facts while exploring various beautiful environments. Complete tasks, play mini-games, and watch the animal AI explore with you in this educational single-player simulation game.

name: Frogman Magmaborn
description: A story-based rogue-like startegy RPG. Discover story and characters each run, battle in diverse hand-crafted maps, and edit everything with the dedicated modding tool!

name: One Last Breath
description: A 2,5D adventure set in a world in which almost no life is left you will play as Gaia, a being born from nature's last wish with power to influence the surrounding nature in order to face a dark world while being chased by strange creatures.

name: Titan78
description: This is survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: Plunger Boyz
description: Plunger Boyz is an entertaining platformer in which you have to reach the end of Chaos and reclaim your crown using the plunger to pull in and out of objects, as well as going through some challenges and solving puzzles.

name: Chick Boy Adventures
description: Chick Boy Adventures - Immerse yourself in the fantasy world of dreams of an unprecedented sweet tooth and collect all the goodies before someone else eats them! Collect sweets in the vast nooks and crannies of your mind and get as far as possible on this extraordinary adventure.

name: Scrapvival
description: Fight off robot hordes with help of your friends or alone as soon as possible build the helicopter and escape that damned and creepy junkyard!

name: Conrad Stevenson's Paranormal P.I.
description: This ghost hunting simulation is a first-person single player experience. You’re equipped with an EMF Meter, Thermometer, Audio Recorder, Camera, and a Flashlight collecting evidence to satisfy homeowners concerns.

name: Running Challenge
description: Race with other AI players, achieve levels

name: Pets at Work
description: Some pets got lost from their owners in an office and now need to work together, using boxes, mats, buttons, climb on shelves and tables or just make a mess trying to find them in this colorful co-op game!

name: Revenants: Spirit & Mind
description: Revenants is single-player VR Action/ Horror. Become a professional occult investigator, relying on cutting edge technology from 2030 to locate, trap and battle demonic forces, all whilst gathering evidence and solving the mystery of the occult crimes.

name: The Infecting 3
description: Fight zombies, customise your character or your ride and try to survive! In The Infecting 3 the characters have crash landed on a mysterious island, and must find the truth behind this horrific apocalypse.

name: Brave Doggy Quest
description: Brave doggy quest - Mysterious creatures have stolen the entire supply of your favorite bones and scattered them everywhere - you need to do something about it! Go on a journey, collect your wealth and put things in order!

name: Deadly Infestation
description: Collect resources, hunt, mine, build your base, weapons and objects to help you survive. Are you able to discover the real reason for your journey?

name: Ultimate Tag
description: Gather your friends (or your enemies) and play Ultimate T.A.G. - A light-hearted, fun, callback to the game of everyone's childhood! With multiple game modes such as Classic, Infection, and Freeze Tag, endless hours of fun are guaranteed!

name: Industriality
description: Future, Robots have invaded the planet and terrorized cities. Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only the Hero can stop this madness.

name: Boxville
description: Boxville is an adventure puzzle game about speechless cans living in the city of boxes and drawing doodles on cardboards to tell the stories. Made in Ukraine.

name: WavePlayer
description: WavePlayer is a single player 2D pixelart wave survival game, the goal of the game is to defeat all of the enemies that spawn in intervals using a legendary Warrior and emerge victorious from the depths of the deep circling forests and caves.

name: Nobodies: After Death
description: Nobodies: After Death is a puzzling point-and-click adventure in cleaning up dirty work. After your agency takes out a target, you make the evidence disappear without a trace. Find a way to get in, get out, and leave no bodies behind.

name: Into the Waves
description: Morin is a barkeeper with an unusual curse. All people look like shadows to him, except for one mysterious stranger... Solve the mystery of the curse, fight true darkness and mix the most unusual cocktails in the atmospheric visual novel — Into the Waves!

name: Friendsim 2
description: In this episodic visual novel, follow the adventures of MSPA Reader as they return to Alternia once more to save their friends... and realize that nothing is as it seems.

name: Hell Invades Heaven
description: Can you imagine that God himself missed paying hot water bill? Take command of hellish forces and with the small help of Almighty, but a little bit lazy Devil, show this old man, that hell kettles are not boiling for free.

name: Splodge Royale
description: Use Gyro Aim to Paint and Power Slide your way around while defeating Monsters, building platforms and avoiding the deadly Squog (Square Fog). Single Player and up to 4 Local Players for Co-op and Versus. From the maker of Zombie Death Quota.

name: TraxWorld
description: Open-world third-person game crossed with an off-road vehicle sim. Exit the vehicle in 3rd person, use character tools, collect items to sell from the pouch or collect your machines in the vehicle inventory. Mods, damage and dirtiness is progressive and lasting. Multiple stage releases.

name: Gods of Hellas VR
description: Save your residents and keep their islands from sinking.

name: Moadra
description: Endure... Evolve... Or Die. Embrace the unknown and traverse a vast alien world riddled with bizarre creatures, deadly hazards, and grim mysteries. Seek redemption, and confront the terrifying sin buried in the depths of the forgotten planet Protea VI.

name: Jumphobia: Homeward Bound
description: Jump, skip, hop and leap in Jumphobia: Homeward Bound, an indie sci-fi adventure game! Go as far as your little wheel can take you! Play as a little delivery bot from a far-flung future controlled by the monolithic "MARE" corporation, and find your way back home through the perilous deserts, dead forests, and untold wildlands that lie ahead.

name: Drone Crash Course
description: Drone crash course - Being a pilot of a controlled drone is not easy. Having decided to master this profession, you sign up for training and attend classes for a whole year .. and now the day of the final exam has come!

name: Zombie Vegas
description: Meet a zombie apocalypse in the most not boring place on earth - Las Vegas? Why not! Zombie Vegas is an intense arcade action game with the strange red button and the hero protecting it. Buy weapons and bonuses, barricade ways and destroy the approaching zombie.

name: Pieces of Beauty 2
description: Deemed a Master of the Chinese Bird and Flower Painting Style, Ohara Koson produced hundreds of prints during his life. Discover 16 majestic pieces made by one of Japan's most celebrated artists while you sharpen your brain and relieve stress playing this Jigsaw Puzzle Game.

name: Save the Reactor
description: What if you happened to be in a control room of a nuclear reactor and something went wrong? Save the Reactor gives you the opportunity to fully experience these emotions! This simulator is great for those who like to challenge themselves and aren't afraid of difficulties!

name: Scoop Kick!
description: Help Ms. Cream and her friends on their quest to retrieve all the stolen ice cream from the evil Juice Bunch! Venture through more than 5 different worlds in this arcade inspired game where your goal is to kick scoops and assemble ice cream cones. Aim for the high score or try to get the best time!

name: Faded Stories: Greenberg
description: Here in the city of Greenberg time is meaningless, and space is infinite. The city has endless history and yet... The whole place is fading away.

name: Panacle: Back to Wild
description: A CCG integrating warchess, roguelike, deck building with a world outlook of the post civilization era

name: Paper Bride
description: Paper Bride is a Chinese horror mystery puzzle game. You will play as the groom to search for the truth and have bizarre encounters, gradually learning about the dark mystic custom in the bride's home village and a story from the past...

name: Kingdom of Dinza
description: A top-down 2D, procedurally generated, open world fantasy RPG. Explore wild areas, forests and dungeons, fight monsters and craft superior weapons and armor as you uncover the mysteries and overcome the challenges of the Kingdom of Dinza!

name: No Rage Quit Dude
description: a game where only luck counts, jumping from platform to platform. Just mystery and luck will be essential for this game. Maybe you can finish maybe you can not. I just know the assets but I don't know what will you see and what gonna happen.

name: Shadow Cave
description: Shadow Cave - Uncover the secrets of the shadow cave in this platformer game with its protagonist. Explore the dark sections of dangerous nooks and crannies, collect coins and watch out for ghosts!

name: Save the Llama
description: Craft the perfect defense upon shifting platforms, turning gears, and railways to defend your cows from alien UFO's in this space western tower defense.

name: Latarnix Puzzle
description: Help the boar Latarnix as he passes through a variety of puzzles with obstacles to reach delicious golden apples at the end of each of the 50 levels in the game.

name: Doggo
description: Follow Doggo on his quest to find his Human so he can finally go back to sleep.

name: Feed All Monsters
description: Feed All Monsters is a cute and cozy Line Puzzle game. Assist a team of delivery workers in their quest to bring tasty food to all the little monsters. Find the optimal path for each worker in order to get all the monsters fed.

name: Haunted Hell House
description: Horror action ADV to enjoy the fear.

name: Eden's Last Sunrise
description: A classic tactics RPG where magic and technology clash to determine the fate of the world. Command tactical battles, befriend and train your troops, create custom heroes, and experience the story through multiple branching paths.

name: Once in Flowerlake
description: This is a short story in a sci-fi setting with a top-down view, telling the story of a nameless man lost in routine in the middle of a cold world and soulless machines. But what if it could be different?

name: The Tribulation Entanglement
description: Born into a nightmarish fever dream, the Entangled One must fight its way through diverse, visually striking environments, from a blasted wasteland beneath an eternal eclipse, to mutant-filled swamps, and the putrid guts of the underworld...

name: The Misty Tale
description: The Misty Tale is a third-person fantasy-fighting game where you have to swim on a raft, navigate the terrain on the map, find and remove magical runes, and fight their defenders, to fulfill the request of your savior

name: Malody V
description: Ultimate music game simulator

name: Monkey Doomsday
description: Welcome to a world where the entire human population of earth is undergoing a massive de evolution process! The human race has de evolved back into monkeys and are causing an apocalyptic mayhem over the entire earth, and It's only up to you to end this terrorizing madness!

name: Hive Defender
description: Classic RTS and Tower Defense elements combine inside of a procedurally generated and fully destructible labyrinth. Control multiple alien swarms simultaneously, unlock and activate special abilities, and team up with friends online to beat back waves of human invaders!

name: Aussie Clowns At War
description: Aussie Clowns At War Dec 15, 2021 a free humorous fast paced multiplayer pc fps war shooter with some favored old school qualities like "COD MW2 kil streak announcer and Vietcong CTF" & 5 game modes 20 maps, awsome weapons classes including flame thrower, easy secure player hosting.

name: Sky DarkCrow
description: Crow has to defeat enemies and collect coins and others.

name: Connectify
description: Welcome to the Connectify puzzle! The object of the game is to connect dots with the same numbers in a line without crossing other lines.

name: The Fabulous Fear Machine
description: Everything you’ve ever dreamed of can be yours with The Fabulous Fear Machine, a narrative-driven strategy game with a pulp horror style. Become a Master of the Machine, spread the darkest Legends of urban myth, and let fear rule the world.

name: Battle Fishing Masters
description: Battle Fishing Masters combines a fishing RPG and shooter with rogue-lite elements. Catch, battle and collect over 150 unique robot fish. Upgrade new weapons and gear. Meet a cast of exotic characters with quests, and challenge the fishing bosses on your way to becoming the champion!

name: Little Red Rocket Ship
description: Little Red Rocket Ship is a bullet hell game with shoot-'em-up and platforming sections, featuring challenging but short levels and multiple weapon and ship options.

name: Alien Shepherd
description: Alien Shepherd is a platformer with a flying mechanic that can be activated by fusioning with a pet Jellyfish.

name: Zoms & Guns
description: Zoms & Guns takes place in a picturesque town brimming with museums, multi-coloured houses, enticing boutiques and cozy cafés. The town is home to very warm and friendly people. Life takes a turn on a cold winter night, suddenly an evil darkness takes over the neighbourhood.

name: Cellings
description: Cellings is a creative sandbox game taking place in an abstract procedural world full of various species. Experience the full evolution of cells across 3 generations, compete with other species, and explore breathtaking worlds.

name: Dog Clicker
description: Welcome to the world of Dogtopia! Here in Dogtopia, dogs are your greatest companion! They often like to play around, bark at inanimate objects, and fetch stuff! They also seem to have a keen eye for shiny things!

name: Gravity Flip
description: Gravity Flip is a Single-Player, 2D platforming game. Throughout the game, the player must utilize the ability to switch the pull of gravity to maneuver around obstacles as they explore deeper.

name: Pixel Skater
description: Pixel Skater is a fast-paced arcade skateboarding game with precise controls, a deep combo system, and an extraordinarily detailed level editor. Play, build, and compete online with your friends. Not a social butterfly? Enjoy an immersive story mode, challenges, and even puzzles!

name: Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke
description: Poor Lucas and the Evil Duke is a Metroidvania with action and RPG elements. Jump, slide, wall jump, swim, and battle your way through the Dukedom. Other mechanics include pushing boxes, pulling levers, and swinging on ropes.

name: The Divide
description: "The Divide" Is a tactical turn-based strategy game, with deckbuilding elements, set in a divided land, fight for your king, and unite the kingdom!

name: Moorhuhn Adventure: Der Schatz des Pharao
description: Sin descripción

name: Soccer Boss
description: Be the Boss of your own soccer club, choosing from clubs from the biggest leagues across Europe. Make decisions based on tactics, training, staff recruitment and player selection. Spend your transfer budget wisely during the transfer window whilst keeping the board satisfied with your performance.

name: Blade Crusade
description: Put your platforming and fighting skills to the test in Blade Crusade, where each of the 200+ levels may take you seconds or hours to beat! Use your growing arsenal of moves to slice through enemies and dash through levels at breakneck speed.

name: Kupechestvo
description: Kupechestvo is a board game with historical elements.

name: Vendir: Plague of Lies
description: Vendir: Plague of Lies is a classic party-based RPG with a deep storyline and initiative-based combat. Experience an intricately crafted world, steeped in history and brought to life through a carefully crafted atmosphere and the trials and tribulations of stories of the people that inhabit it.

name: Signum Perfectum
description: Collectible card game where opponents fight in turns casting magic upon each other.

name: Delivery Boy
description: Become the best courier in Crystal City and create your own delivery business. Explore the big city, complete tasks, collect resources and build your own delivery services.

name: Mathomatics
description: Runner puzzle on reaction speed and ability in mathematics. You control a cube that moves towards math blocks.

name: Cannon Canines
description: Cannon Canines is a 3D, mini-tank driving, action-adventure game! Play as a Cannon Canine, and join a crew of freedom-fighting animals in the Pawpad Isles in order to free your friends from a tyrannical megacorporation!

name: Pants Quest
description: Pants Quest is a tiny, lovingly crafted point & click adventure game about finding your way in life. And your pants. Sometimes just getting dressed & leaving the house feels like an impossible task. Follow one man's emotional journey to deal with the hurdles that life can throw at you on a bad day.

name: Serendipity Hotel
description: The detective is invited to the Serendipity Hotel. What will the detective experience in the hotel? Become a detective and participate in the Serendipity Hotel event

name: Blackholes Stars
description: A click-based physics game.

name: Brinefall
description: Gather resources to build your own home and village. Explore a vast open-world to find all its secrets and explore its mysteries. Defeat enemies and gather loot in a game that combines sandbox and RPG.

name: Alien Prop Hunt
description: Jump into an exciting new take on a classic concept! Alien Prop Hunt is an action packed team-based game where one team desperately tries to hide in plain sight, while the other relentlessly searches through environments to find them!

name: The Hepatica Spring
description: Run a beautiful bathhotel, uncover drama, and date a fabulous cast in this fairytale-inspired visual novel!

name: Enigmarella
description: Happy birthday Alice Rahner! You will be forced into an arranged marriage. Of course, falling in love with your new husband is entirely up to you. With 16 truly unique endings, are you willing to follow your heart?

name: Star Witch
description: Sandbox sci-fi fantasy survival RPG. Play as a scientist working on teleportation, who gets sent to another world that has been taken over by a witch, and your only way home is to join the resistance.

name: Scriptur
description: Scriptur is a kinetic visual novel featuring original artworks, soundtrack, and characters. You woke up on the train, knowing not how you ended up in it and where it was going. What is the secret behind all this? Will it be possible to reveal it and restore the memories of what happened?

name: Dungeon Color
description: Dungeon Color is a top-down puzzle game, where you switch between flames in order to achieve the rainbow flame in each room. Interact with special obstacles and melt your brain to find the exit. Cute, colorful, hard, fun.

name: Tetromino X
description: Tetromino X is a collection of falling block action puzzle games each with their own unique spin. Relax and drop blocks at your own pace in Chill. Balance and stabilize a stack of blocks as it grows ever higher in Stack. Match blocks together to upgrade upcoming blocks in Match.

name: Child of Hope
description: In this old-school RPG, you are the Child of Hope.
